body:
I don't have any screenies, but the map was CherryLandMC. The enemy team was running scared.

This could be Avicus's transition to accepting maps with TNT.

It was a SCATTER CANNON MUHAHAHHAHAHAHA!

title: Milestone: First To Make a Cannon in Avicus

replies.body:
Did you just create it today?  If so, I've seen a lot of people make TnT cannons in the past on Avicus.

Congratz on making one though! :D
replies.body_tagged:
Did you just create it today?  If so, I've seen a lot of people make TnT cannons in the past on Avicus.

Congratz on making one though! :D

replies.body:
Yes, today. But Avicus never had maps with TNT. This is the only map that has tnt. Theres 4 stacks of 32 TNT at the front. 

I've seen LOTS of cannons from OCN. But never was there a cannon in Avicus and before CherryLandMC had only 4 TNT.

I'm the first to make a cannon in Avicus.
replies.body_tagged:

I'm the first to make a cannon in Avicus.

Anyone who sees me in CherryLandMC, if ur my teammate, plz paws off the buttons. Let me show how to cannon. Afterwards, ill give u 32 TNT and u will show me UR cannon.

If ur my enemy, watch out. I'll blaze ur whole base up ;)
